name: Hyper Ball (pubbi)
description:
Tap and hold the left side of the screen to Slow Down time (Drains Meter)

//Press A to slow down time (PC) 

Tap and hold the right side of the screen to Speed Up

//Press S to speed up (PC) 

Collecting Orbs refills Meter.

Collect Triads to Purchase Unlockables in the Shop.

Avoid Obstacles as long as you can!
